MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG16 area of Gretna, affecting properties in The Beeches and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to repairs required to our electricity network near Alisons Bank and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:16pm on Monday, 12 April 2021
